name: Send a new SMS via Twilio from a new response in Survey123
description:
Every time a new response is submitted in Survey123, an SMS will be sent via Twilio.

This template was created based on a survey with these questions:
1) Full Name
2) Email
3) Phone number
4) Describe your problem

You can use your own survey with different questions but you will need to update the mappings - especially in the SMS body.
